project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and calculates the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement feature to read CSV file
Implement feature to select numerical columns from user input
Implement feature to calculate mean for selected columns
Implement feature to calculate median for selected columns
Implement feature to calculate mode for selected columns
Write tests to validate calculations (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
